channel.title: kusanku on Seven steps
channel.description: Recent content in kusanku on Seven steps

item.title: Teaching kusanku to sankyu
item.description: Last night, after some kicking drills and sparring, sensei entrusted the adult class to me and told us to work on kusanku. The 'adult class' yesterday consisted of three sankyu. I looked at the clock, rubbed my hands together and said "Alright everyone, we have twenty-five minutes' worth of kusanku. Let me know if you have questions or doubts." When we had finished walking through it, I looked at the clock.
